Posts.Content: ksuparent wrote: Hi Everyone - Yesterday I found a lump.  Rather than waiting, I called my gyn and they got me in this morning.  After feeling it, he immediately referred me to a breast surgeon and I am being seen on Monday.  While I am glad they are seeing me quickly, it only feeds my fear that it is something more than something harmless.  Trying to relax but a little wigged out right now. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Found a lump ksuparent ksuparent

Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2010 08:45AM ksuparent wrote: Hi all...I'm a little confused.  Went to the surgeon yesterday and he felt the lump and took an ultrasound.  He said I had three choices.  1 - wait 6 six weeks to see if there is any change. 2- do a needle biopsy but because of the size he was not sure if he could get enough of a sample to make an accuate diagnosis.  3 - cut it out which he thought was overkill.  So - do I respect the surgeon's opinion and wait to see what happens? He said if it started to change rapidly to come see him sooner.  Do I seek another opinion?  Am I being paranoid that I am not doing enough?    Thanks everyone.
Posts.Title: Found a lump ksuparent ksuparent

Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2010 09:04PM ksuparent wrote: I decided I am going to wait the six weeks.  Take care everyone and thanks for the feedback.
